name: expressive-css
title: Expressive CSS
description: A starter template configuration for building sites Expressive CSS.

scripts.build: node-sass css/sass/base.scss css/stylesheets/base.css --style expanded && node-sass css/sass/utilities.scss css/stylesheets/utilities.css --style compact && node-sass css/sass/components.scss css/stylesheets/components.css --style expanded && node-sass css/sass/style.scss css/style.min.css --style compressed
